mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM TB_PTFOLIO_BLOG_COMT WHERE BCOMT_BLOG_SEQ = #{blogSeq}

SELECT BCOMT_SEQ as "seq", BCOMT_BLOG_SEQ as "blogSeq", BCOMT_NAME as "name", BCOMT_PWD as "password", BCOMT_CONTENTS as "contents", BCOMT_DATE as "date", BCOMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_BLOG_COMT WHERE BCOMT_BLOG_SEQ = #{blogSeq} ORDER BY CONCAT(IF(BCOMT_PARENT_SEQ is null, COALESCE(BCOMT_PARENT_SEQ, ''), CONCAT('_', LPAD(BCOMT_PARENT_SEQ,6,'0')) ), '_',LPAD(BCOMT_SEQ,6,'0')) LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPgLine}

SELECT BCOMT_SEQ as "seq", BCOMT_BLOG_SEQ as "blogSeq", BCOMT_NAME as "name", BCOMT_PWD as "password", BCOMT_CONTENTS as "contents", BCOMT_DATE as "DATE", BCOMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_BLOG_COMT WHERE BCOMT_SEQ = #{seq}
